"【愉しさの中の違和感】<br>仮テキスト": "Oh my my my! Well, well! Hehehe. What a coincidence. How fun! Hello!"
"Lisa's in the middle of mowing enemies down. Now that the Darkers have increased in number, it's an all-you-can-kill slaughterfest!"
"Lisa hasn't encountered that rampaging dragon everyone's been talking about, but this is still fun, so that's fine."
"Still though, yeah... Everyone in ARKS has been getting kind of wimpy lately!"
"Between the revival of Mr. Dark Falz and the growing distrust in ARKS leadership, it feels like everyone's in a slump, you know?"
"From Lisa's perspective, it's all quite silly."
"Who cares about the facts or the truth and all that stuff?"
"It's simple, isn't it? If there's an enemy around, we just gotta kill them, and that's that."
"If more enemies we're allowed to shoot show up, then Lisa has cause to celebrate, you know?"
"Because then Lisa will have this, that, these, and all those things to shoot. Hehehe. Hehehehehe!"
